hints.label: thm-main-explicit-rate
hints.title: Main Result: Explicit Convergence Rate
hints.content:
4848: :label: thm-main-explicit-rate
4849: 
4850: Under the assumptions of Stage 0.5 (QSD regularity R1-R6) and the parameter condition:
4851: 
4852: $$
4853: \sigma^2 > \sigma_{\text{crit}}^2 := \frac{2\lambda_{\text{LSI}} C_{\text{Fisher}}^{\text{coup}} + C_{\text{KL}}^{\text{coup}} + A_{\text{jump}}}{\lambda_{\text{LSI}}}
4854: 
4855: $$
4856: 
4857: the mean-field Euclidean Gas converges exponentially to the QSD with rate:
4858: 
4859: $$
4860: \boxed{\alpha_{\text{net}} = \frac{1}{2}\left(\lambda_{\text{LSI}} \sigma^2 - 2\lambda_{\text{LSI}} C_{\text{Fisher}}^{\text{coup}} - C_{\text{KL}}^{\text{coup}} - A_{\text{jump}}\right)}
4861: 
4862: $$
hints.raw_directive:
4845: ## 10. Conclusion
4846: 
4847: :::{prf:theorem} Main Result: Explicit Convergence Rate
4848: :label: thm-main-explicit-rate
4849: 
4850: Under the assumptions of Stage 0.5 (QSD regularity R1-R6) and the parameter condition:
4851: 
4852: $$
4853: \sigma^2 > \sigma_{\text{crit}}^2 := \frac{2\lambda_{\text{LSI}} C_{\text{Fisher}}^{\text{coup}} + C_{\text{KL}}^{\text{coup}} + A_{\text{jump}}}{\lambda_{\text{LSI}}}
4854: 
4855: $$
4856: 
4857: the mean-field Euclidean Gas converges exponentially to the QSD with rate:
4858: 
4859: $$
4860: \boxed{\alpha_{\text{net}} = \frac{1}{2}\left(\lambda_{\text{LSI}} \sigma^2 - 2\lambda_{\text{LSI}} C_{\text{Fisher}}^{\text{coup}} - C_{\text{KL}}^{\text{coup}} - A_{\text{jump}}\right)}
4861: 
4862: $$
4863:
